abilities.description: Chaotic void energies altered your physiology allowing you to shapeshift your appearance for short periods of time. When you make a move to deceive or avoid notice by altering your physical appearance, boost. On a weak hit, it is painful. @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.905205c073b09eac]{Endure Harm} (-1). On a miss, the transformation fails. @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.

When you shapeshift your body to increase your battle prowess, envision the change and roll +iron or +health. On a strong hit, set aside an action die with a value of 6. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash} leveraging this change, boost and reduce the value of the die by 1. When the die would be set to 0, the transformation ends. On a weak hit, as above but it is painful. @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.905205c073b09eac]{Endure Harm} (-1). On a miss, the transformation fails. @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} due to dangerous environmental conditions, boost as your body shifts to handle the conditions better.
